snippet: Evan Lysacek, the reigning Olympic figure skating champion, said Tuesday that a torn labrum in his left hip would keep him from competing in the Sochi Games.
abstract: Evan Lysacek, the reigning Olympic figure skating champion, reports that torn labrum in his left hip will keep him from competing in Sochi Games.
lead_paragraph: Evan Lysacek, the reigning Olympic figure skating champion, said Tuesday that a torn labrum in his left hip would keep him from competing in the Sochi Games.
